text:
Hey folks :wave:
Does anyone know where I can get certification badges in SVG format so they are crisp and sharp in all my marketing assets?
Right now, they are PNGs with white bg, unfortunately :disappointed:

I'm talking about these ones

Hey there :corgi-wave:
I decided not to wait but to act. So here's a pack of five HubSpot Academy badges in SVG format:
• Growth-Driven Design
• HubSpot for CMS Developers
• HubSpot for CMS Developers II
• SEO
• SEO II
Hope I don't violate any copyright by redrawing from PNGs into SVGs in Figma :crossed_fingers:

Hope this will be helpful to someone :orange_heart:
Enjoy!
